Articles.Content:
A few hours ago I came up with an octohedron shaped rocket for use as an orbital predator

missile launcher. All went well except for the fact the missile can\'t really be aimed.

So I decided this mad scientist project would be great for a challenge. I doubled

it, made it i little more structurally sound and decided its your problem now.

Here is your ship:

Here are your challenges:


  • [li]Easy mode: Land the whole thing on Minmus[/li]
    [li]Medium mode: Land the whole thing on Mun[/li]
    [li]Hard mode: Get the crew Back to Kerbin[/li]
    [li]God mode: Splashdown/Land The WHOLE thing back on Kerbin
    (Whole refers to original structure plus allowed changes) [/li]
    [li]BONUS points if you can make this look more ridiculous[/li]
    [li]DOUBLE BONUS points if you can fly another ship through the gaps[/li]

The Rules


  • [li]Vanilla parts only[/li]
    [li]Fuel lines can be added freely[/li]
    [li]You can add landing gear to the original structure[/li]
    [li]You can change/add wings to the original structure[/li]
    [li]Other than that you cannot change/modify the original
    structure, but can add as many stages as you like and
    modify those[/li]

Note: Must go back to VAB to restart flight or it falls apart

Good luck, God speed
WOW, thats all I have to say.
